tenant.description: The tenant which this chunk and job belong to

originalSize.description: size of the original/parent file, in records

filePath.description: location of the file in storage

timestamp.description: time that the object was created

partNumber.description: the sequential number of the part, starting at 1

processing.description: if this chunk is currently being processed (if false, this chunk is waiting to be processed)

okapiUrl.description: The Okapi URL originally provided in the x-okapi-url header
